body_html:
Can you try with tf 0.11 from inside virtual env?

IE, if you use conda,

conda create -n tf11-2 python=3.5 
source activate tf11-2
pip install -I --upgrade setuptools
export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.11.0rc0-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl
pip install --upgrade $TF_BINARY_URL

source activate tf11-2
pip install -I --upgrade setuptools

body:
Can you try with tf 0.11 from inside virtual env?

IE, if you use conda, 

```
conda create -n tf11-2 python=3.5 
source activate tf11-2
pip install -I --upgrade setuptools
export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.11.0rc0-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl
pip install --upgrade $TF_BINARY_URL

```
